summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on October 2, 2009. The email discusses a late-night communication and emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the information contained within. It also includes a warning against unauthorized use or disclosure of the communication.
